step.cmd: In the <prolog> element of you topic, insert a <metadata> element and within the <metadata> element, an <othermeta> element.
Set the name attribute of the <othermeta> element to TopicAlias.
Set the content attribute of the <othermeta> element to the topic ID you want to specify for the context-sensitive help topic.
Generate your HTML5 Document set using ePublisher
Verify that the topics alias marker has been created through ePublisher's Topics report.
